About universAAL Middleware Suite (OSGi)

The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Thirdparty jslp library (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware XSD Schemas XSD Schema for universAAL common data model
universAAL Middleware Data Representation (OSGi) Using RDF/OWL model for data representation in universAAL (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Container (OSGi) An implementation of the interfaces exported by the Container building block of the universAAL middleware on top of the OSGi runtime
universAAL Middleware Interfaces (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Connector API (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Broker API (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Module API (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Manager API (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Broker Control (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Module AALSpace (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Connector Discovery SLP (OSGi) SLP Discovery Connector
universAAL Middleware Module Communication (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Connector Communication JGroups (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Manager AALSpace (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Manager Tenant (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Manager Deploy (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware RDF Turtle serializer (OSGi) The module for message content serialization in Turtle (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Manager Configuration (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Deploy Connector Karaf (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Karaf Branding The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Karaf Shell The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Bus Model (OSGi) A Soda-Pop implementation as an OSGi bundle based on the ACL (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Context Bus (OSGi) The realization of the context bus on top of Sodapop as part of the universAAL Middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Service Bus (OSGi) The realization of the service bus on top of Sodapop as part of the universAAL Middleware. (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware User Interaction Bus (OSGi) The realization of the user interaction bus on top of Sodapop as part of the universAAL Middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Service Annotated API (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware BusMember Tracker (OSGi) Module for tracking BusMembers registered in the MW buses
universAAL Middleware Felix Shell The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Manager Distributed MW (OSGi) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
universAAL Middleware Suite Composite Artifact responsible for generating composite file of universAAL middleware
universAAL Karaf Feature Middleware The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL middleware (OSGi)
